result.title: Do we like the dynamic scoring?
result.content: If you don't know what the dynamic scoring is, you can read about it here. In my opinion it's a useful alternative. With smoother steps (250 instead of 500) it doesn't work so bad. Or does it? The main advantage is that organizers don't have to correctly estimate the difficulty. What are drawbacks? And should it be changed and improved in some way?
